response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, but recognizing its significance to you, we are excited to extend this offer. We propose a transaction price of $1,200,000 for the product. We believe this price reflects its true worth while also providing you with a substantial benefit compared to its market value of $1,500,000. We look forward to discussing this further and potentially bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 1200000}
